Title: Nobara (OVA)
Description: ['Soldiers in two countries, each protecting the stone monument at the border. As children they grew up together but war is separated them. This short explores the theme of "what is friendship". ']
Related: ['Prequel: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Zenkoku Taikai-hen - Final', 'Side story: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story - Kako to Mirai no Message Specials', 'Sequel: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story II - Ano Toki no Bokura']
